'''September, 27 2007 meeting Minutes'''

'''Weekly Meeting of the New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo'''

'''Members Present''' 
* David Thomas dthomasdigital
* Eric Kriger gcleric
* uuwsley
* MrWhat

'''Others Present'''
* some lurkers but no one chimed in

'''Proceedings'''

Meeting called to order at 8:00pm by Member David Thomas

'''Topics Discussed''' 

We have a new Community Loco project installing and supporting ubuntu for a local non-profit EPC. We will need to get a service level agreement going with them.

Changed the Gutsy Release Party to the 19th of October.

We discussed placing an add in the local college news paper.

Have left over Software Freedom Days packets to hand out, who wants them.

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

Good talk about the direction and promotion of the LoCo
